Text: Don't let her get away this time! Surround her!
...You know them, Gamma?
Yes, that armor with the signature left arm...

That man is probably Sergey Gorman, one of Velgalta's
Seven Blades.
Velgalta's Seven Blades...

He's a formidable warrior who won a duel wagering the
Seven Blades title, claiming that position along with
his opponent's life.

His skill with that great sword may even surpass the
Seven Blades' leader... Those are the kind of rumors
surrounding him as a master swordsman.
...You know a lot, Gamma.

We're visiting the Empire, so it's only natural to
have done some research in advance...
Oh, that girl's right leg...
Yeah...symptoms of possession.
Wait, is she being hunted?!
If so, we need to hurry up and help her!
Wait, Gamma.
Why?!

...There's a reason why there are so many of them out
here in the middle of nowhere. Gamma...you said so
yourself.
I...! I know, but...!
So let's eavesdrop and find out.
Eavesdrop? How can we, from this distance?
*dig, dig*

I see. You're using slime to probe underground and
locate the voices.
...Hold on, can you actually hear them like that?!
And...just position the tip...like this...

"Quite the feat for you to have made it all the way
to this borderland, my lady."
"Ack!"
I can hear them clearly!

I've applied our lord's Shadow Wisdom of the
"telephone." I can't wait to make an actual
telephone... Heheh.

The possessed are supposed to be handed over to
the Cult, and your family neglected their duty as
aristocrats...
But...but still...!

As aristocrats affiliated with the Cult...the Herzog
Family had been entrusted with maintaining stability
within the Empire!

I'm the one who was possessed! Why? Why not just
eliminate me instead of purging my entire family?!

Even if I were gone, the Cult of Diablos would still
find value in the territories and wealth held by the
Herzog Family, not to mention leveraging their
aristocratic influence.

Why? Why would the Cult go so far as to eradicate
everything my family has built over generations in
this Empire?!
...Humph...

You still don't seem to grasp your position, my lady.
I suppose that's to be expected, coming from your
pampered past of tranquil stability.

Since you've become possessed, it's only natural that
I should eradicate your entire family.

If I am to rule this Empire, what good is a political
base with a possessed Child?
What?!

Are you saying that the purge of the Herzog Family
wasn't decreed by the Round Table Committee?!
Who... Who sent you to do this?!

Hah! Your loyalty truly is admirable, even in your
current predicament.

But you're only a Child, after all... You speak like
a subservient mouthpiece!
How dare you!
You're a Child as well, just like me!
Unforgivable... I will never forgive you!
Who said anything about wanting your forgiveness?!

This woman may be rotten to her core, but she's still
a spear wielder of the Seven Blades!

Maintain your distance, slow her down, and attack
from her right, where her vision is limited!
Let those with a death wish...step forward!

Wait, hold on! Is this a rift between leaders of
the Cult?!

And that elf over there is also one of Velgalta's
Seven Blades!

She mentioned the Herzog Family and being a spear
wielder, so she's probably Karen von Herzog of the
Seven Blades...

In other words, Sergey and Karen are both leaders
in the Cult of Diablos while also...being members
of Velgalta's Seven Blades?!
"Round Table"... "Child"...

...Wonder what that means... I'm a little
interested...
